examples.description: Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £1000 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £510 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment
examples.full_description: Auto Enrolment 2018 Checking eligibility for an employee paid more than the earnings trigger Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £1000 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £510 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment

examples.description: Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £832 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then they are not eligible for auto-enrolment
examples.full_description: Auto Enrolment 2018 Checking eligibility for an employee paid less than the earnings trigger Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £832 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then they are not eligible for auto-enrolment

examples.full_description: Auto Enrolment 2018 Checking eligibility for an employee earnings less than the lower limit Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £489 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then they are not eligible for auto-enrolment

examples.description: Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £4500 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £3260 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment
examples.full_description: Auto Enrolment 2018 Checking eligibility for an employee paid more than the upper limit Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £4500 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £3260 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment

examples.description: Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £700 monthly -> When they prepare payroll -> And they add a bonus of £200 to the payslip -> And they add commission of £100 to the payslip -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £510 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment
examples.full_description: Auto Enrolment 2018 Checking eligibility for an employee with additional pay Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £700 monthly -> When they prepare payroll -> And they add a bonus of £200 to the payslip -> And they add commission of £100 to the payslip -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £510 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment

examples.description: Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £400 monthly -> When they prepare payroll -> And they add statutory sick pay of £300 to the payslip -> And they add statutory adoption pay of £100 to the payslip -> And they add statutory maternity pay of £100 to the payslip -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £410 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment
examples.full_description: Auto Enrolment 2018 Checking eligibility for an employee with statutory pay Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £400 monthly -> When they prepare payroll -> And they add statutory sick pay of £300 to the payslip -> And they add statutory adoption pay of £100 to the payslip -> And they add statutory maternity pay of £100 to the payslip -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £410 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment

examples.description: Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £500 monthly -> When they prepare payroll -> And they add a bonus of £150 to the payslip -> And they add an allowance of £50 to the payslip -> And they add other payments of £200 to the payslip -> And they add deduction free pay of £100 to the payslip -> Then they are not eligible for auto-enrolment
examples.full_description: Auto Enrolment 2018 Checking eligibility for an employee with other payments Given the current date is 2017-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2017-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2018 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £500 monthly -> When they prepare payroll -> And they add a bonus of £150 to the payslip -> And they add an allowance of £50 to the payslip -> And they add other payments of £200 to the payslip -> And they add deduction free pay of £100 to the payslip -> Then they are not eligible for auto-enrolment

examples.full_description: payroll/profiles/_pension_contributions for a company that can see KB links renders the pension contributions question with a KB link

examples.description: renders the pension contributions question with a link to gov.uk
examples.full_description: payroll/profiles/_pension_contributions for a company that cannot see KB links renders the pension contributions question with a link to gov.uk

examples.description: renders the signup attempt details
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show renders the signup attempt details

examples.description: shows a Notice with the reason the signup was blocked
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show for a blocked signup shows a Notice with the reason the signup was blocked

examples.description: displays a message if an email has already been sent
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show for a blocked signup where an email has already been sent displays a message if an email has already been sent

examples.description: says that an email has yet to be sent
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show for a blocked signup where an email has not been sent says that an email has yet to be sent

examples.description: does not show a Notice
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show for a valid signup does not show a Notice
